
# Setup Playground
## Setup Virtualenv
[Follow oficial intructions](https://virtualenv.pypa.io/en/stable/installation/)  
Then, create a virtualenv inside that folder and activate it
```bash
virtualenv .env -p python3
source .env/bin/activate
```
Install all dependecies
```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

Privkey "identity" is registred and can generate invite tokens from it.

## Invite
```bash
python invite.py
```
* Select an identity file (PEM), default './identity' already registred
* Set Passphrase or leave empty to autogenerated one
* Response with new invitation token
> You can set -v attribute to see query and variables
## Register
```bash
python register.py
```
* Insert invitation token
* Select new identity filename, be storen on './.identities' folder with selected filename
* Response with error or success.
> You can set -v attribute to see query and variables
## Backup
```python
python backup.py
```
* Select an identity file (PEM), default './identity' already registred
* Set Passphrase or leave empty to autogenerated one
* Insert backup description, can be string or json_string or any kind of string data
* Insert backup content, same think, can be any string content.
* Response with backup container hash or error.
> You can set -v attribute to see query and variables
## Restore
```python
python restore.py
```
* Select an identity file (PEM), default './identity' already registred
* Insert backup container hash
* Insert Passphrase
* Response with backup content and description.
> You can set -v attribute to see query and variables
